result.eng: And if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ga: agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.orig: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.html: agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobhAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ponchtml: agus dá mba ḃuama é caiṫfiḋ gur ċeann ollṁór é a ṗléascfaḋ an foirgneaṁ amaċ ar ḋá ṫaoḃAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.

result.eng: Clearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ga: ba léir go raibh stáit aontaithe mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
